entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Joliette
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
